statements: SELECT * FROM markers;
SELECT id, marker_name, chromosome, position, trait_association FROM markers;
SELECT marker_name, trait_association FROM markers WHERE position > 1000;
SELECT * FROM markers WHERE trait_association = TRUE ORDER BY chromosome, position DESC;
SELECT id, marker_name FROM markers WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND trait_association = FALSE ORDER BY position;
SELECT id, marker_name, chromosome, position, trait_association FROM markers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome, position FROM markers WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND trait_association = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM markers WHERE trait_association = FALSE ORDER BY marker_name DESC;
SELECT id, marker_name, chromosome, position FROM markers ORDER BY position, chromosome ASC;
SELECT id, marker_name, chromosome, position FROM markers WHERE chromosome LIKE 'Chr%' AND position > 1000;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT marker_name, trait_association FROM genetic_markers WHERE chromosome_number = 'X';
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM trait_information WHERE trait_id = 1;
SELECT marker_name, trait_name FROM genetic_markers JOIN trait_information ON genetic_markers.marker_id = trait_information.marker_id;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers WHERE marker_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers JOIN trait_information ON genetic_markers.marker_id = trait_information.marker_id WHERE marker_name = 'GeneX'
SELECT marker_name, trait_name FROM genetic_markers, trait_information WHERE genetic_markers.marker_id = trait_information.marker_id AND chromosome_number = '22' ORDER BY trait_name DESC
SELECT marker_id, trait_name, trait_description FROM trait_information WHERE trait_name LIKE '%growth%'
SELECT marker_name, trait_name FROM genetic_markers LEFT JOIN trait_information ON genetic_markers.marker_id = trait_information.marker_id WHERE chromosome_number = 'X'
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers JOIN trait_information ON genetic_markers.marker_id = trait_information.marker_id ORDER BY trait_name ASC
SELECT * FROM genotype;
SELECT gene_name, allele_1, allele_2 FROM genotype WHERE id = 1;
SELECT trait_name FROM trait ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM marker WHERE location = 'Chromosome 1';
SELECT marker_name, trait_name FROM marker JOIN trait ON marker.trait_id = trait.id;
SELECT * FROM genotype WHERE id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, allele_1, allele_2 FROM genotype WHERE allele_1 = 'A' AND allele_2 = 'B';
SELECT * FROM marker WHERE location LIKE '%Region%';
SELECT trait.trait_name, trait.description, marker.marker_name FROM trait JOIN marker ON trait.id = marker.trait_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM genotype;
SELECT * FROM markers;
SELECT marker_name, position, chromosome FROM markers ORDER BY chromosome ASC;
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM traits WHERE trait_id = 1;
SELECT marker_name, trait_value FROM marker_traits ORDER BY trait_value DESC;
SELECT sample_name, data_collected FROM samples WHERE data_collected BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT marker_name, chromosome, position FROM markers;
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM traits WHERE trait_id > 10 ORDER BY trait_name DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT(marker_name) AS marker, trait_name, trait_value FROM markers m JOIN marker_traits mt ON m.marker_id = mt.marker_id JOIN traits t ON mt.trait_id = t.trait_id WHERE mt.trait_value > 0.5;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome, position FROM markers WHERE position BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY chromosome, position DESC;
SELECT sample_name, data_collected, t.trait_name FROM samples s JOIN traits t ON s.trait_id = t.trait_id WHERE s.data_collected > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sample_name;
SELECT * FROM markers;
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, position, chromosome FROM markers ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome FROM markers WHERE position > 1000;
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM traits WHERE trait_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT sample_name, collection_date FROM samples ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM markers;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome FROM markers WHERE position > 1000 ORDER BY chromosome DESC;

SELECT markers.*, traits.trait_name FROM markers JOIN marker_traits ON markers.marker_id = marker_traits.marker_id JOIN traits ON marker_traits.trait_id = traits.trait_id WHERE traits.trait_description LIKE '%genetic%';

SELECT samples.sample_name, markers.marker_name, sample_markers.allele FROM samples JOIN sample_markers ON samples.sample_id = sample_markers.sample_id JOIN markers ON sample_markers.marker_id = markers.marker_id WHERE samples.collection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY samples.collection_date ASC;
SELECT marker_id, COUNT(sample_id) AS sample_count FROM sample_markers GROUP BY marker_id HAVING sample_count > 5 ORDER BY sample_count DESC;
